sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const PersonalDetail = ({ detail, email }) => { var passenger = detail?.passengers; var filteredPassengers = passenger?.filter((passenger) => passenger.email === email); return (

Personal Details

Booking Name: {filteredPassengers?.[0]?.name}

Booking Created: {detail.created}

Tel: {filteredPassengers?.[0]?.phone}

Email: {filteredPassengers?.[0]?.email}

Flight Attempts: {detail.flight_attempts}

Expires: {detail.expires}

Paid: {detail.paid}

) } export default PersonalDetail;
